getInstance

public static AmmpClient getInstance(Endpoint endpoint,
                                     CommunicatingAsset asset)
Static factory method to get an Android AmmpClient instance.

Parameters:
endpoint - The AMMP endpoint
asset - The AMMP asset
Returns:
An AmmpClient instance
Throws:
NullPointerException - if endpoint or asset is null

register

public abstract AmmpResult register()
Registers an AMMP asset.

Returns:
AmmpResult The AMMP response. Register does not return any egress communication, so the result can be ignored.

register

public abstract AmmpResult register(int pingRate)
Registers an AMMP asset.

Parameters:
pingRate - The Registration details
Returns:
AmmpResult The AMMP response. Register does not return any egress communication, so the result can be ignored.

send

public abstract AmmpResult send(Transmission transmission)
Sends ingress domain data.

Parameters:
transmission - A Transmission containing domain data.
Returns:
AmmpResult The AMMP response. The result will contain EgressNotification data if it was available.

poll

public abstract AmmpResult poll()
Polls for egress notifications.

Returns:
AmmpResult The AMMP response. The result will contain EgressNotification data if it was available.

Returns:

downloadPackageFile

public abstract FileDownload downloadPackageFile(PackageInstruction download)
Download a file from the platform that was learned about through an EgressNotification.

Parameters:
download - The PackageInstruction containing the download information
Returns:
FileDownload representing the downloaded file
Throws:
AmmpClientException - if the download fails

updatePackageStatus

public abstract AmmpResult updatePackageStatus(PackageStatus status)
Update the status of the package.

Parameters:
status - The new PackageStatus.
Returns:
AmmpResult The AMMP response. updatePackageStatus does not return any egress communication, so the result can be ignored.
